text: Ulysses is a 1967 British-American drama movie loosely based on James Joyce's novel Ulysses. It concerns the meeting of two Irishmen, Leopold Bloom and Stephen Dedalus, in the Dublin of 1904. It starred Milo O'Shea as Leopold Bloom, Barbara Jefford as Molly Bloom, Maurice RoÃ«ves as Stephen Dedalus, T. P. McKenna as Buck Mulligan and Sheila O'Sullivan as May Golding Dedalus. It was adapted by Fred Haines and Joseph Strick. It was directed by Strick. Haines and Strick shared an Oscar nomination for the screenplay. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 drama movies Category:1960s British drama movies Category:1960s American drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joseph Strick Category:Movies set in Dublin
title: Ulysses (1967 movie)
